translation.en: BOTH: Come and play with us. Come and play.

translation.ja: ジェイク ママ　平気？

translation.en: REPORTER 1: This morning's quake is causing major problems for commuters.
translation.ja: 今朝の地震で 通勤の足は乱れ

translation.en: The 5.7-magnitude quake hit New York early this morning.
translation.ja: ＮＹでは マグニチュード5.7を記録

translation.en: Yet another in a series of quakes that has rattled both coasts.
translation.ja: 東西両海岸で 地震が群発する中―

translation.en: Tokyo was hit again. And with the Berlin quake last week--
translation.ja: 東京やベルリンでも たびたび地震が…

translation.en: REPORTER 2: Question is: What is causing all these earthquakes?
translation.ja: 群発地震の原因は何か？

translation.en: Christ, even ESPN's doing the quakes now.
translation.ja: スポーツ局(ＥＳＰＮ)まで地震か

translation.en: Hey. My folks sent me over to see...
translation.ja: 親が無事か見てこいって

translation.en: -...if you guys are still alive. -We're fine, Timmy.
translation.ja: 親が無事か見てこいって ティミー

translation.en: -See you later? LAURIE: Say hi to your mom for me.
translation.ja: じゃあ 心配どうも

translation.en: Don't forget, you have Dr. Hotchkiss after school.
We're wasting money on all those shrinks.
Come on, man, just give me my book.
-What's wrong, your meds stop working? TEACHER: Hey! Hey!
JAKE: Give me my book! -Get off me!

translation.ja: やめなさい　チェンバーズ

translation.en: Hey. You need to go home and cool off.
translation.ja: 帰って頭を冷やしなさい

translation.en: HOTCHKISS: You've been, uh, quite busy, Jake.
This big tower in the clouds you keep dreaming about...
translation.ja: 夢に出てくる この塔だけど―

translation.en: ...you say these earthquakes we've been having have something to do with it.
translation.ja: 最近の地震と関係あるって？

translation.en: They happen because the Tower is under attack.
translation.ja: 塔が攻撃されるのが 原因だと？

translation.en: You know when you can't differentiate...
translation.ja: 夢と現実が違うことくらい…

translation.en: -...between dreams and reality-- -It's not a dream.
translation.ja: 夢と現実が違うことくらい… 夢じゃないし イカれてない
夢じゃないし イカれてない

translation.en: I always see the same thing.
The Tower, the Man in Black, the creepy guys with the fake skins.
translation.ja: 塔　黒衣の男 偽の皮膚の怪物

translation.en: What if the Tower were destroyed?
translation.ja: 塔が崩れたら 何が？

translation.en: When you lost your father, your world fell apart.
translation.ja: 実の父の死がショックで―

translation.en: You have these visions of impending hell on Earth... ...because that's how you feel inside.
translation.ja: 世界が滅ぶ夢を見るんだ そんな気分なんだろ？

translation.en: Even words like "darkness" and "fire"... ...Jake, you're describing the night your father died.
translation.ja: “闇と炎”とは お父さんの 亡くなった晩のことだよ

translation.en: They'll take you. They steal kids like you. Cross them over.
translation.ja: 奴らは君のような子供を 誘拐してる

translation.en: Special ones. The power of your mind, that's what they want.
translation.ja: 特別な子供をな その心の力を欲しがってる
ジェイク どうした？　変だぞ

translation.en: Let's go. -Want to hang out? JAKE: Yeah.
LON: --control, he's unstable. We need to take the offer.
translation.ja: いい話だぞ 無料でセラピーなんて

translation.en: -It's great treatment for no money. LAURIE: It's not about the money.
translation.ja: いい話だぞ 無料でセラピーなんて また お金の話？

translation.en: -I'll wait in your room. LON: There's nothing more...
-...we can do for him now. LAURIE: Jesus, Lon!
translation.ja: 部屋にいる 自分の子のように扱って

translation.en: Can you at least pretend like he's your own kid?
translation.ja: 自分の子のように扱って

translation.en: I'm sorry, baby, we.... We didn't hear you come in.
translation.ja: 帰ってたのね 気づかなくて

translation.en: What the hell happened in school today?
You promised me you're gonna stay out of trouble.
...the school's been approached by a clinic upstate.
translation.ja: 学校からクリニックの話が

translation.en: They work with kids who.... Who are having a hard time.
translation.ja: 悩みを抱える子を 受け入れてるの

translation.en: There's an opening this weekend. It's supposed to be a great place.
translation.ja: 今週末から行けるって きっといい所よ

translation.en: It's science-based: Brain scans, sleep patterns.
translation.ja: 科学的アプローチが中心だ

translation.en: LAURIE: I think it could-- -Yeah, okay.

translation.ja: サイコ・キャンプかよ 最悪だな
精神分析なんてムダだよ

translation.en: Stop staring at your drawings. You're freaking me out.
translation.ja: 絵を見つめるのはよせ キモい

translation.en: You think I'm crazy too, don't you?

translation.ja: “ガス爆発で死者５人 救助中に消防士死亡”

translation.en: I'm just asking.... We need help. We both need help.
translation.ja: “エルマー・ チェンバーズ消防士”

translation.en: LAURIE: I love him so much...
translation.ja: あの子を愛してる 今の姿は見ていて辛い

translation.en: ...and I just can't stand to see him like this.
translation.ja: あの子を愛してる 今の姿は見ていて辛い 昔は明るかったのよ

translation.en: He was such a happy kid.
No more dreams. Just one night of sleep.
translation.ja: もう夢は見ない 今夜は ただ眠る

translation.en: You have nothing to be afraid of, my friend.
translation.ja: 何も恐れることはない

translation.en: You want to know what's on the other side?

translation.ja: すべてウソ 地獄へ落ちろ

translation.en: Not while the Tower still stands. Not while you still stand.
translation.ja: 塔があり お前がいる限り 違う

translation.en: Don't let him get into your head.

translation.ja: 拳銃使い(ガンスリンガー)

translation.en: BOTH [IN UNISON]: I do not aim with my hand.
-He who aims with his hand-- -Has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ja: 手で狙う者 父親の顔を忘却せり

translation.en: BOTH [IN UNISON]: I aim with my eye.

translation.ja: 我は目で狙い定める こっちだ

translation.en: BOTH [IN UNISON]: I do not shoot with my hand.
He who shoots with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ja: 手で撃つ者 父親の顔を忘却せり

translation.en: -I shoot with my mind. WALTER: Gunslingers.
BOTH [IN UNISON]: I do not kill with my gun.
He who kills with his gun has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ja: 銃で殺す者 父親の顔を忘却せり
抗(あらが)って　闘うんだ

translation.en: It never works on you, does it, Roland?
translation.ja: 助かったな　ローランド

translation.en: The power you have to resist my magics....
translation.ja: お前に私の幻術は効かん

translation.en: WOMAN: The Man in Black fled across the desert... ...and the Gunslinger followed.
translation.ja: 黒衣の男は砂漠の彼方へ ガンスリンガーが追った

translation.en: -Hey. -This guy, he's some kind of soldier. He's called a Gunslinger.
translation.ja: 彼は兵士らしい ガンスリンガーだって

translation.en: And this house, look, it's got a U.S. mailbox.
translation.ja: 家のポストは米国風 きっとＮＹだ

translation.en: -I think it's in New York. MAN: Timmy, it's 7 a.m.
translation.ja: 家のポストは米国風 きっとＮＹだ まだ朝の７時だぞ

translation.en: Sorry, got to go. Talk to you later.
translation.ja: ごめん　後で話そう

translation.en: The people from the clinic are here.
I can't.... I can't go now.
You got to step up, Jake. If you won't do it for yourself, then do it for your mom.
translation.ja: 踏み出すんだ お母さんのためにも

translation.en: LAURIE: It's in other boys? JILL: It's common in adolescent boys.
translation.ja: 他にも 思春期には多いです

translation.en: I'm Jill. I'm your intake administration supervisor.
translation.ja: ジルよ あなたの収容・管理担当

translation.en: What exactly do they do at your clinic?
Jake, these guys have been working with the school for a long time.
translation.ja: 学校と提携してるし大丈夫

translation.en: No, that's okay, Laurie. We encourage questions. It shows spirit and vitality.
translation.ja: 質問は歓迎です 積極性の表れですから

translation.en: He's just a healthy growing boy.
I can assure you that all our tests are done in a controlled... ...child-friendly environment.
translation.ja: 検査は子供にも優しい環境で 行われるの

translation.en: We have experience with cases like yours.
translation.ja: 大勢を受け入れてきたわ
夜驚(やきょう)症 幻覚や妄想に悩む子供

translation.en: Our approach is actually very gentle compared to standard treatments.
translation.ja: 私たちは新しい手法を使う

translation.en: I understand your concerns, but you don't have to worry at all.
translation.ja: 心配することはないわ

translation.en: It's two days. Do you want your ripped jeans or your regular ones?
translation.ja: ２日だけよ ダメージジーンズにする？

translation.en: -What? -It's the skin people from my dream.
-Honey, you need to stop this. -No, you have to listen to me.
translation.ja: それを治すのよ 話を聞いて

translation.en: He's not human. -That's not his real face. -For chrissake.
You actually hope I'm crazy, just so you can get me out of here.
translation.ja: 僕が異常だったら 追い出せるもんな

translation.en: Mom, you have to believe me.
-Lon, maybe this-- -Can't you see he's gotten worse?
translation.ja: ロン　やっぱり… 彼は悪化してる

translation.en: You're gonna go with them right now. Or, I swear to God, I will drag you down the stairs myself.
translation.ja: 行かないなら 引きずってでも引き渡すぞ

translation.en: If you don't like it, then I'll come get you.
-I love you, Mom. -I love you too.
I'm just gonna get my toothbrush.
-He's just getting his things. -He's trying to escape.
translation.ja: 心配ないわ 逃げる気よ

translation.en: TOBY: Come back here! JILL: Don't worry.
translation.ja: 戻るんだ 安全に確保しますから

translation.en: Toby will get him down safely.
translation.ja: 安全に確保しますから

translation.en: -Mom? You okay? LAURIE: Where are you?
You can't just run away like that, Jake.
ELECTRONIC VOICE: Greetings, traveler. Please enter destination.
translation.ja: 旅行者は 目的地の入力をどうぞ
中間世界 一方通行

translation.en: Find yourself a face, Rat Boy. You're in my house.
Fine. Do we have any new leads?
translation.ja: よかった　どんな状況だ？

translation.en: PIMLI: These are all showing promise. Our trackers are going out to them as we speak.
translation.ja: 全員 有望です 追跡員が向かってます

translation.en: TIRANA: There's been a serious breach of--
Unauthorized crossing, sir. One of the old portals on Keystone Earth.
translation.ja: “根本原理世界(キーストーン↓アース)”のポータルで 無断越境です

translation.en: Find me a portal close by.
Choose a pretty face and the world is your oyster.
translation.ja: 世間は美人に弱いからな
ジェイク・チェンバーズ
ガンスリンガーでしょ？

translation.en: There are no Gunslingers. Not anymore.
translation.ja: ガンスリンガーは もういない

translation.en: -But I saw you. -Your dreams deceived you, boy.
translation.ja: でも見た 夢を信じたか

translation.en: Told you what you want to hear.
I came a long way to find you. From another world!
translation.ja: あなたを捜しに来たんだ 別の世界から

translation.en: ROLAND: Have a nice trip back.
Look, I saw you. There was a battlefield, and you were fighting the Man in Black. And there--
translation.ja: 見たんだ 黒衣の男と戦ってた

translation.en: The Man in Black? -No, no, no. -You know him?
translation.ja: 黒衣の男？　知ってるのか？

translation.en: -Stop. Please, please, please. -He sent you. You're one of his tricks.
translation.ja: 奴の手先か　幻術だな

translation.en: -No, no, no. I don't know! -Where is he hiding?!
translation.ja: 奴はどこだ？ 知らない

translation.en: -Where is he hiding?! -I don't know, I swear!
translation.ja: どこにいる？ 知らない その人も夢で見ただけ

translation.en: I just-- I just saw him in my dreams, like I saw you!
translation.ja: 知らない その人も夢で見ただけ

translation.en: When did you first see this?

translation.ja: 最初は１年前 あの男は何者？
最初は１年前 あの男は何者？ 魔道師だ

translation.en: In all your visions, Walter is here?
translation.ja: ウォルターが ここにいたのを見たのか？

translation.en: There's a tribe beyond that forest. We'll go there.
translation.ja: 森の先に住む 部族の所へ行くぞ

translation.en: They have seers who will read your visions.
translation.ja: 夢を読める“読み人”がいる

translation.en: Then I got water up my nose, and I went down...

translation.ja: ちょっと　どうかしたの？

translation.en: Walter Padick. To what do we owe this great honor?
translation.ja: ウォルター・パディック様 光栄です

translation.en: Someone used a portal here, in your city... ...without your knowledge.
translation.ja: この街のポータルを 誰かが勝手に使い

translation.en: We'll find out who this trespasser is and where he went.
translation.ja: 正体と行く先を調べます
純粋な“輝き(シャイン)”が

translation.en: So that's how he got through.
House demons are formidable beings... ...but a truly powerful psychic could override it.
translation.ja: 館の妖魔は強いが 強靱(きょうじん)な心の者なら倒せる

translation.en: A boy with the Shine strong enough to kill a demon?
translation.ja: 妖魔も殺す 強い“輝き”の子？

translation.en: Sayre, didn't two skins have trouble with a kid yesterday?
translation.ja: セイヤー 昨日 逃がした子がいたわね

translation.en: Don't want to have to carry you for the rest of the way.
They belong to Walter. Don't run off in the woods. It's not safe.
translation.ja: ウォルターに仕えてる 森に入るな

translation.en: But you were the one who ran off.
These ancient structures are from before the world moved on. No one knows what they are.
translation.ja: 世界の“変転”前の古い建物だ 何かは知らん

translation.en: There was a field covered with bodies.
I lost my father that day.
It's an honor to meet you in person, sir.
What brings you here? How may we serve him?
translation.ja: 王の御用で こちらへ？

translation.en: Well, I hear you lost a kid.
It was as if the child knew what we were. We're doing everything we can--
translation.ja: 正体を見抜いてたようで 今 捜索を…
名前と住所を ここに
ジェイク・チェンバーズ

translation.en: Calm down. Enjoy the show, folks.
translation.ja: 心配ない　ショーを楽しめ
お楽しみはこれからだ

translation.en: You draw with a good hand.
I don't know what this is.
My father showed me a.... A map like this once.
translation.ja: 父が以前 こんな地図を見せてくれた

translation.en: Inside the circle is your world and my world...
translation.ja: 円の内側に お前の世界と俺の世界がある

translation.en: ...many others. No one knows how many.
translation.ja: 他の世界も　いくつもある

translation.en: The Dark Tower stands at the center of all things.
translation.ja: すべての中心にあるのが 暗黒の塔(ダークタワー)だ

translation.en: And it's stood there from the beginning of time.
And it sends out powerful energy...
translation.ja: 塔は強力なエネルギーで―

translation.en: ...that protects the universe... ...shields us from what's outside.
translation.ja: 宇宙を守り 外に対する盾となってる

translation.en: What do you mean, "outside"? What's outside the universe?
translation.ja: 外って何？ 宇宙の外に何があるの？

translation.en: ...full of demons trying to get to us.
translation.ja: 我々を狙う化け物だらけ

translation.en: Walter wants to tear down the Tower and let them in.
translation.ja: ウォルターは 連中を入れる気だ

translation.en: When the Tower falls, he'll rule... ...in a world full of monsters.
translation.ja: 塔が崩れれば 奴が怪物の世界を制する

translation.en: But you're trying to stop him, aren't you?
I've seen them try to destroy it.
translation.ja: 塔は攻撃されてた　僕らが…

translation.en: -If we could just get there-- -There is no "we," Jake.
All that matters to me is that I find... ...and kill Walter.
translation.ja: 俺の目的は ウォルターを捜し 殺すこと
ビーム震だ　大きいぞ

translation.en: They're just like the quakes we get back home.
Yeah, what happens in one world... ...echoes in others.
translation.ja: ある世界での出来事は 他と共鳴するからな

translation.en: Everyone who walks with you dies.
translation.ja: お前と歩む者は皆 死ぬ

translation.en: It's good to see you, man. You got tall.
translation.ja: 会いたかった　見違えたよ
だって… “死んだ”か？　ここでは違う
“死んだ”か？　ここでは違う
おいで　もう平気だ
ローランド　我が息子

translation.en: No, they sense your weakness... ...create illusions to distract you.
translation.ja: 連中は敵の弱さを見抜き 幻影で心を乱す

translation.en: That was just a small tear. They happen after every attack on the Tower.
translation.ja: 塔が攻撃されるたび 裂け目から連中が現れる

translation.en: Those things, they're what's coming if the Tower falls, aren't they?
translation.ja: 塔が崩れたら 一斉に入ってくる？

translation.en: But if we find that place where they're keeping the kids, we could--
translation.ja: でも捕まった子供たちを…

translation.en: That was brave, going for the gun.
LON: They're gonna find him, Laurie. We filled out every form. They have his picture.
translation.ja: 警察が見つけてくれるさ 写真も渡した

translation.en: I hope you don't mind me making myself at home. Where I come from, we don't have chicken.
translation.ja: 勝手にやってる 私の所はチキンがなくて

translation.en: -Who the hell are you? -Oh, you know me, Lon.
translation.ja: 誰だ？ トボけるな 呼んだのはお前だ

translation.en: You're the one that called me here.
translation.ja: トボけるな 呼んだのはお前だ

translation.en: Not by the telephone... ...but with your every desire to get rid of the brat...
translation.ja: 口にはしないが 望みはガキを追い払い―

translation.en: ...all in the hopes that Mommy there might love you best.
But you'll always be a seat-filler, Lon.
translation.ja: だがお前は身代わりさ

translation.en: -You get out of here right now. -Lon.
It's the man from Jake's drawings.
Well, it looks like I've got myself a stalker.
translation.ja: 私はストーカー被害に 遭ってたのか

translation.en: This son of yours is quite special, isn't he?
translation.ja: 特別な息子じゃないか
さぞや後悔してるだろ

translation.en: And you sent your only child off to the asylum.
translation.ja: その上 施設に送ろうとまでした
長き昼と 楽しき夜を

translation.en: May you have twice that number.
I haven't seen one of your kind since I was a young man.
translation.ja: ガンスリンガーは久しぶり

translation.en: WOMAN: That would be me. I'm Arra.
translation.ja: それなら私ね　アラよ

translation.en: The boy here has visions of this place.
translation.ja: この子が ここの夢を

translation.en: I need to know where it is.
PIMLI: We managed to do some serious damage, sir...
translation.ja: 損傷を与えても崩れません

translation.en: -...but it didn't fall. WALTER: None of that matters.
translation.ja: 損傷を与えても崩れません もういい　見つけた

translation.en: I found the one. This kid's going to bring down the Tower...
translation.ja: もういい　見つけた １人で塔を崩せる少年をな
どこに？ ここ 中間世界にいる
ここ 中間世界にいる

translation.en: ...looking for an old friend of mine, Roland of Eld.
translation.ja: ギリアドのローランドを 捜してる

translation.en: Wait, I thought all the Gunslingers were dead.
WALTER: Roland's always had an annoying ability... ...to resist my magics.
translation.ja: 忌々しいが 奴に私の幻術は効かんので

translation.en: So I killed everyone he ever cared about.
translation.ja: 愛する者を殺してきた

translation.en: Last I heard, he was roaming the Mohaine aimlessly.
translation.ja: 最後はモヘインにいた 少年もそこだ

translation.en: -That's where the boy is going. -Mohaine Desert? Isn't that--?
translation.ja: 最後はモヘインにいた 少年もそこだ モヘイン砂漠？

translation.en: Vast. Yes. And so is this boy's Shine.
translation.ja: 広大だ　少年の“輝き”もな

translation.en: I'll send our trackers in the region, sir.
NURSE: This will get worse. I don't have anything that can help with that.
translation.ja: この傷に効く薬草はないわ

translation.en: You need to rest, let it heal.
You've come all the way from Keystone Earth to find him.
translation.ja: 根本世界から来たのね

translation.en: His Shine is beyond anything I've ever seen.
Psychic powers. Very few are born with this gift.
translation.ja: 超能力よ 持って生まれる人は少なく

translation.en: Often, the power is so slight, people don't even know they have it.
translation.ja: 大抵は弱くて 本人も気づかない

translation.en: ARRA [THINKING]: Your Shine burns so brightly, Jake.
translation.ja: あなたの“輝き”は すごく明るい

translation.en: You have potential I can't even begin to understand.
translation.ja: その力は計り知れないわ

translation.en: Her voice was in my head.
It made you see across worlds.
ROLAND: The drawing. What about the drawing?
That's more than six months of travel.
But you can get me there faster than that.
The Man in Black and his men keep track of all portal travel.
translation.ja: 移動は監視されてるわ
急ぐんだ ポータル？

translation.en: We couldn't help you, even if we wanted to.
The only way to access their territories is from one of their own bases.
translation.ja: 連中の基地からでないと 行けない

translation.en: Then I'll make it on foot.
...they take kids from different worlds, right? They tried to take me from New York.
translation.ja: 僕はＮＹで誘拐されかけた つまりＮＹには…

translation.en: -Doesn't that mean that they--? -They have a base there.
translation.ja: 僕はＮＹで誘拐されかけた つまりＮＹには… 基地がある

translation.en: With a portal that can take me right to this place.
translation.ja: そこのポータルで ここへ行ける

translation.en: You're gonna send us to Keystone Earth.
CANTAB: We're diverting power to the generators. The portal will be ready shortly.
translation.ja: 今 電力を回してる すぐ準備できるぞ

translation.en: Do they have guns in your world?
And bullets, are they as rare as they are here?
translation.ja: 弾は？　やはり希少なのか？

translation.en: You're gonna like Earth. A lot.
translation.ja: 喜んで　山ほどある

translation.en: We agreed we'd never use the portal unless the village was in danger.
translation.ja: ポータル使用は 緊急時のみのはず

translation.en: They will find out we have it and come.
translation.ja: 連中が知れば 来る

translation.en: We can't disobey a Gunslinger. It's the law.
translation.ja: ガンスリンガーには従う掟だ

translation.en: -How do you know what he is? -Arra.
translation.ja: 彼 本物？ アラ　彼を読んでくれ
アラ　彼を読んでくれ
ギリアドのローランド

translation.en: Last of the line of Eld.
translation.ja: アーサー王の末裔(まつえい)

translation.en: But the Man in Black has his soul in his pocket...
translation.ja: でも黒衣の男に魂を奪われ
心は復讐で 凝り固まっている

translation.en: He's not a Gunslinger. Not anymore.
translation.ja: もはや彼は ガンスリンガーではない

translation.en: Or would you tell us differently?
Only a goat would lie to a seer.
You dishonor your ancestors. The Gunslingers have sworn an oath to defend the Tower--
translation.ja: 先祖の面汚しめ 塔を守るのがあんたらの…

translation.en: The war is over, and we lost.
If you left your little haven, you would see that for yourself.
translation.ja: 村の外へ踏み出せば分かる

translation.en: The darkness is everywhere... ...and trying to fight against it accomplishes nothing.
translation.ja: どこも闇が満ちている 戦うだけムダというもの

translation.en: I was fighting to defend the Tower before most of you were even born.
translation.ja: 俺は昔から塔を守ってきた
戦いの日々だった　常に

translation.en: Isn't that why we're losing? Because everyone stopped believing.
translation.ja: 信じることをやめたから 負けたんじゃない？

translation.en: As long as the darkness is out there, the Tower will fall.
translation.ja: 闇の力がある限り いずれ塔は崩れる

translation.en: And before that happens, I will get my revenge.
translation.ja: その前に復讐を果たす

translation.en: JAKE: Look. He saved my life.
translation.ja: 聞いて 彼は僕を助けてくれた

translation.en: And he doesn't even like me that much.
He's still a Gunslinger. I know he is.
translation.ja: 彼はガンスリンガーだ 僕には分かる

translation.en: CANTAB: Should be ready anytime now.
As soon as it aligns, it should open... ...in an unobstructed area in your city... ...on your version of Earth.
translation.ja: 同調したら 君の街の 開けた場所に行けるはずだ

translation.en: Technology's very old. Remember that number. It's your way back here.
translation.ja: 機械が古い 数字を覚えろ　戻る時に使う
大丈夫　前にやった

translation.en: PIMLI: Sir, they're in the village.
-Can you fix it? -We have spare parts in the village.
translation.ja: 直せるか？ 部品が村にある

translation.en: Jake, go find somewhere close to hide, understand?
translation.ja: ジェイク 近くで隠れてろ　いいな

translation.en: -We need to go! Hurry! -Are you okay?
His guns are forged from the steel... ...of the sword of Arthur Eld himself.
translation.ja: 奴の銃は アーサー王の剣から作ったもの

translation.en: I believe Keystoners call it Excalibur.

translation.ja: お願い　早く行って

translation.en: -We have to get out of here. -No, I've got to get them out!
No, no, please, we have to go!
WOMAN: They were after our boy. Why would they want our boy?
translation.ja: 息子を狙ってた　なぜ？

translation.en: -Turn on the water pumps. MAN: Right away, sir.
WOMAN: No! MAN 1: Let's try to get them out!

translation.ja: 狙いはジェイクよ 知ってる
ローランド　何してるの？
ローランド　何してるの？ 静かに

translation.en: We need to leave. He's not safe here.
translation.ja: 行かないと　ここは危険だ

translation.en: And as long as he's here, you aren't either.
translation.ja: 君らも巻き込んでしまう

translation.en: ARRA: Jake. Be careful using the Shine. They're tracking you.
translation.ja: “輝き”を使うと 敵は気づくから
ポータル 同調完了
いや　まだだ これを加えろ
ナイフだ シェフさ　行こう

translation.en: We need to get you help. Right now.
translation.ja: まず傷を治療しないと

translation.en: One last time around the wheel, old friend.
translation.ja: 運命の輪は巡り また会える

translation.en: You can't walk into a hospital here carrying guns. Trust me. Come on.
translation.ja: 銃を持って病院には行けない 僕を信じて

translation.en: Let me do all the talking.
LAURIE [ON RECORDING]: Hi. You've reached Laurie, Lon and Jake. Please leave a detailed message... ...and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
translation.ja: ローリーとロンとジェイクです 伝言をどうぞ

translation.en: RACCOON 1 [ON TV]: This is awful. Try it.
-That looks gross. What is it? -You got to try it. It's terrible.
translation.ja: そりゃ何だ？ ヤバいぞ

translation.en: -I don't want to try it if it's terrible. -It's like mango....
Do the animals here still speak?
Wait, what do you mean by "still"?
Mr. Deschain. I see the antibiotics are kicking in.
translation.ja: デスチェインさん 抗生物質が効いたのね

translation.en: On a scale of one to 10, how bad is your pain?
translation.ja: 今 痛みは10段階でいくつ？

translation.en: You were in very bad shape. I'm surprised you're even sitting up.
translation.ja: あんな重傷だったのに 起きられるとは

translation.en: We get that sentiment a lot.
So aside from your infection and the wound from the... ...costume-party incident...
translation.ja: 仮装パーティでの ケガって話はともかく―

translation.en: ...we also found traces of hepatitis A, B, E, and...
translation.ja: 血中に肝炎の抗体があった ＡとＢとＥ　それに―

translation.en: Have you traveled overseas in the past couple of months?
translation.ja: 最近 海外に行った？

translation.en: No. I've been here on Keystone Earth.
translation.ja: いや　ずっと 根本世界にいた

translation.en: So am I cured or not?
We're going to keep you here for the night to monitor your progress.
translation.ja: 今晩は経過を見て 明日の午後には…

translation.en: Maybe tomorrow afternoon-- What are you doing? No.
translation.ja: 今晩は経過を見て 明日の午後には… 悪いが ゆっくりできん

translation.en: -I can't stay here. DOCTOR: You need to get back on that.
translation.ja: 悪いが ゆっくりできん

translation.en: -Wait, what? -May your days be long. But you need to get back on that.
JAKE: These are painkillers and vitamins.
You only want to take one or two at a...
You have both forgotten the faces of your fathers.
translation.ja: 君ら 父親の顔を忘れたか

translation.en: You probably shouldn't talk to people here.
How we gonna find the portal? New York's a pretty big place.
translation.ja: どう基地を探す？ ＮＹは広いよ

translation.en: I don't know. I just can't let Walter know how I'm coming for him.
translation.ja: さあ　ヘタに動くと 気づかれるしな
あの薬 効き目が速いな

translation.en: I haven't felt this good in years.
Yeah, we got the good stuff.
ROLAND: Got any more of that sugar?
ARRA: There's nothing to be scared of.
I promise you, whatever happens... ...you'll be at peace.
translation.ja: 何が起こるにせよ 平穏でいられる

translation.en: -You'll be-- WALTER: A seer who lies.
Don't fight it. Where did he take the boy?
translation.ja: 抗うな 少年はどこだ？
根本世界だな　ありがとう

translation.en: You said they were crossing over kids.
You were one of them, weren't you?
Which way did they take you through?
-No, no, you have to run. -Do you remember? A portal, a door.
translation.ja: 何か覚えてる？ 逃げろ ポータル ドア 何でもいい
ポータル ドア 何でもいい

translation.en: It's almost over. It's almost over. It's almost over.
translation.ja: すぐ終わる　すぐ終わる…

translation.en: They can track the Shine. Okay?
translation.ja: 奴らは“輝き”を追えるんだぞ

translation.en: Should have enough to find it. Got to get home and do some research.
translation.ja: 情報は得た　家で調べよう

translation.en: -Your home? -Yeah, I got to let my mom know I'm okay.
translation.ja: 家？ ママが心配してる

translation.en: SAYRE: We have trackers spread throughout the city.
There's no trace of him yet, sir. Couple of small spikes, but not enough to hone in on.
translation.ja: 反応が弱くて 位置確定できません

translation.en: Don't you worry, Dicky-boy. -I've got you covered. -Sir?
translation.ja: 心配ない　手は打った

translation.en: I left a surprise for our little friend. Just be ready.
translation.ja: 少年に贈り物を残してきた

translation.en: -You should probably wait here. TIMMY: Dude.
translation.ja: 待ってて どこに いた？

translation.en: -Where the hell have you been? JAKE: Timmy. Um....
translation.ja: どこに いた？ ティミー…

translation.en: I'll tell you later. How's Mom and Lon? They must be freaking out.
translation.ja: 後で話す　ママたちは？ 騒いでたろ

translation.en: They haven't been home since yesterday.
Close your mind. Let the pain run through you, Jake.
translation.ja: 痛みに身を任せるんだ

translation.en: My mom died so you could have your revenge?
translation.ja: ママを口実に 自分の復讐を？

translation.en: Maybe your world is almost gone, but mine isn't.
translation.ja: 僕の世界は まだ無事だ

translation.en: You said it yourself, as long as the darkness is out there... ...the Tower's always in danger.
translation.ja: でも闇の力がある限り 塔は危ないんでしょ
ガンスリンガーじゃない

translation.en: Here. It's called the Dixie Pig.
translation.ja: 基地はここ ディキシー・ピッグ
プリマスとパールの角
ガンスリンガーの信条を

translation.en: It calms the heart and the mind.
I haven't spoken it for years.
I do not aim with my hand.
He who aims with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ja: 手で狙う者 父親の顔を忘却せり

translation.en: I do not shoot with my hand.
He who shoots with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ja: 手で撃つ者 父親の顔を忘却せり

translation.en: I do not kill with my gun.
BOTH [IN UNISON] He who kills with his gun has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ja: 銃で殺す者 父親の顔を忘却せり

translation.en: STEVEN: Not while the Tower still stands. Not while you still stand.
translation.ja: 塔があり お前がいる限り…

translation.en: -I kill with my heart. -I kill with my heart.
Your Shine is your weapon, Jake.

translation.ja: うちは… 全部もらう

translation.en: Just do what he says. He won't hurt you.
Well, then you're smarter than most. Hurry up.
translation.ja: 賢いじゃないか　早くしろ

translation.en: All right, let's get you somewhere safe.

translation.ja: ローランド　どうしたの？

translation.en: I see you finally found a compass, yet you still came to me.
translation.ja: 道標(みちしるべ)たる子を見つけても 結局は私の元へ

translation.en: Because I'm your only destination, Roland.
translation.ja: 私しか見えてないんだ

translation.en: It's not me. I'm not doing this.
First, you want to save the Tower.
Then, kill the Man in Black.
You are like a dog fetching a stick over and over.
You tell the kid what happened to the old crew?
translation.ja: 少年に仲間の話はしたか？

translation.en: You tell him that everyone that walks with you dies by my hand?
translation.ja: お前と歩む者は 皆 死んだ話は？
母親は？ 仲間のガンスリンガーは？
母親は？ 仲間のガンスリンガーは？ 戦え

translation.en: Your whimpering excuse for a dad.
Stop hiding behind your magic and face me, Walter!
translation.ja: 幻術で隠れてないで戦え！

translation.en: We both know that no matter who crosses the finish line first... ...the universe will die out eventually.
translation.ja: 我々のどちらが勝つにせよ 結局 宇宙は滅びるのだ

translation.en: Death always wins. That's the deal.
translation.ja: 常に勝つのは死 それが決まりだ
ジェイク・チェンバーズ

translation.en: You are the full package, as advertised.
translation.ja: まさに完璧じゃないか 噂どおりだ

translation.en: Tall, dark and handsome is about to crash the party.
translation.ja: それと 招かれざる客が来る

translation.en: MAN: Let's go, let's go! Move, move!
Alrighty. Let's go put everyone out of their misery, shall we?
translation.ja: 皆を苦しみから 解放してやろう

translation.en: Roland... ...they're taking me to that place.
translation.ja: 奴らに連れていかれる
〝デヴァ・トイ〞 〝デヴァ・トイ〞 用心して
待ってろ　今 行く

translation.en: -It's really gonna happen, isn't it? -Oh, yes, it is.
translation.ja: ついに？ ああ　そうとも

translation.en: Something's wrong here. The levels are plateauing.
translation.ja: こちらも レベルが上がらない
レベルが上がらない 抵抗してる

translation.en: Your visions didn't bring you to him, they brought you to me.
translation.ja: 夢が導いたのは私の元だ

translation.en: He doesn't love you. He doesn't care for you. In fact, he's been using you this entire time to get to me.
translation.ja: 奴はお前を愛してない 私に会うため利用した

translation.en: This is why you're here. This is your destiny.
translation.ja: だからここにいる　運命だ

translation.en: Yes, that's it. There we go.
translation.ja: いいぞ　それを待ってた

translation.en: Oh, my God. It's the kid.
translation.ja: そんな　あの子だ そんな　あの子だ 〝妨害源／現地〞

translation.en: It's the kid! He's keeping the portal open!
translation.ja: 彼がポータルを開いてます

translation.en: So you wanted me to face you, old friend?
It's fitting that you and the Tower should fall together.
translation.ja: お前と塔 共に倒れるがいい

translation.en: I do not aim with my hand.
He who aims with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ja: 手で狙う者 父親の顔を忘却せり

translation.en: JAKE: I do not shoot with my hand.
He who shoots with his hand--
Has forgotten the face of his father.
JAKE: I shoot with my mind.
JAKE: I do not kill with my gun.
He who kills with his gun--
JAKE: Has forgotten the face of his father.
--has forgotten the face of his father.
REPORTER 1 [OVER RADIO]: Multiple witnesses saw... ...the strange phenomena in the sky.
translation.ja: 空で怪現象を 目撃した報告が…

translation.en: REPORTER 2: Looks like we've seen the worst of it.... REPORTER 3: The weather center has now issued a statement...
translation.ja: 最悪の時は過ぎたとの 見方は早計で…

translation.en: ...that it may have been some kind of very intense solar flare.
translation.ja: 最悪の時は過ぎたとの 見方は早計で… 太陽フレア説も

translation.en: JAKE: Here. ROLAND: What is this?
I have to leave here, Jake.
Why don't you come with me?

translation.ja: 残る理由はないだろ それに俺も―

translation.en: Besides, I could use your help.
translation.ja: 残る理由はないだろ それに俺も― 心強い
仲間だ(ガンスリンガー)
